advisories.title: Path Traversal Vulnerability in Express
advisories.description: Versions of express prior to 4.17.1 are vulnerable to path traversal attacks.

advisories.title: Prototype Pollution in Lodash
advisories.description: Versions of lodash prior to 4.17.21 are vulnerable to prototype pollution attacks.

advisories.title: CRLF Injection in Requests
advisories.description: Versions of requests prior to 2.25.1 are vulnerable to CRLF injection attacks.

advisories.title: Cookie Session Fixation in Flask
advisories.description: Versions of flask from 1.0 to 1.1.2 are vulnerable to session fixation attacks.

advisories.title: Server-Side Request Forgery in Axios
advisories.description: Versions of axios prior to 0.21.1 are vulnerable to SSRF attacks.

advisories.title: SQL Injection in Django
advisories.description: Versions of django from 3.1.0 to 3.1.7 are vulnerable to SQL injection attacks.
